result.markdown: --- title: "Outcome secondari" author: "Lorenzo Atzeni" editor: visual format: html: self-contained: true number-sections: false --- ## Analisi Outcome Secondari Nella sezione degli **outcome secondari** applichiamo la **stessa specifica del modello principale** (GLMM Gamma con link log e intercetta random per soggetto) a ulteriori indici respiratori: **RR**, **VT/kg** e **tPTEF**. L’obiettivo è verificare se l’associazione con **BPD**, **hsPDA** (e la loro interazione), aggiustando per **Time, GA, sex, LOS, PH**, sia coerente anche su misure diverse da tPTEF%tE, fornendo una valutazione più completa della funzionalità respiratoria nel follow-up. # 1)Outcome: RR ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](outcome_secondari_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Min. 1st Qu. Median Mean 3rd Qu. Max. 18.60 30.30 40.90 43.13 52.60 96.80 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # RR m_RR <- glmmTMB( RR ~ Time + BPD * hsPDA + GA + sex + LOS + PH + (1 | ID), family = Gamma(link = "log"), data = df_mod ) summary(m_RR) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Family: Gamma ( log ) Formula: RR ~ Time + BPD * hsPDA + GA + sex + LOS + PH + (1 | ID) Data: df_mod AIC BIC logLik -2*log(L) df.resid 1464.2 1500.3 -721.1 1442.2 186 Random effects: Conditional model: Groups Name Variance Std.Dev. ID (Intercept) 0.018 0.1342 Number of obs: 197, groups: ID, 84 Dispersion estimate for Gamma family (sigma^2): 0.0402 Conditional model: Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) (Intercept) 3.751181 0.376197 9.971 <2e-16 *** Time -0.044924 0.002555 -17.581 <2e-16 *** BPD1 0.054176 0.060871 0.890 0.373 hsPDA 0.005064 0.010447 0.485 0.628 GA 0.007645 0.012833 0.596 0.551 sex2 0.038064 0.048092 0.791 0.429 LOS1 -0.008727 0.049064 -0.178 0.859 PH1 0.035330 0.055044 0.642 0.521 BPD1:hsPDA -0.006257 0.011548 -0.542 0.588 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 ``` ::: ::: # 2)Outcome: VT/kg ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # VT/kg m_VTkg <- glmmTMB( Tidal_volume ~ Time + BPD * hsPDA + GA + sex + LOS + PH + (1 | ID), family = Gamma(link = "log"), data = df_mod ) summary(m_VTkg) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Family: Gamma ( log ) Formula: Tidal_volume ~ Time + BPD * hsPDA + GA + sex + LOS + PH + (1 | ID) Data: df_mod AIC BIC logLik -2*log(L) df.resid 927.6 963.7 -452.8 905.6 186 Random effects: Conditional model: Groups Name Variance Std.Dev. ID (Intercept) 0.04082 0.2021 Number of obs: 197, groups: ID, 84 Dispersion estimate for Gamma family (sigma^2): 0.0619 Conditional model: Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) (Intercept) 1.490836 0.522607 2.853 0.00434 ** Time 0.015273 0.003394 4.500 6.79e-06 *** BPD1 -0.079542 0.084204 -0.945 0.34485 hsPDA -0.006488 0.014409 -0.450 0.65253 GA 0.023622 0.017835 1.324 0.18535 sex2 -0.041488 0.066423 -0.625 0.53223 LOS1 -0.071306 0.067577 -1.055 0.29134 PH1 -0.010552 0.076077 -0.139 0.88968 BPD1:hsPDA 0.010025 0.015995 0.627 0.53082 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 ``` ::: ::: # 3)Outcome: tPTEF ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # tPTEF m_tPTEF <- glmmTMB( Time_PTEF ~ Time + BPD * hsPDA + GA + sex + LOS + PH + (1 | ID), family = Gamma(link = "log"), data = df_mod ) summary(m_tPTEF) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Family: Gamma ( log ) Formula: Time_PTEF ~ Time + BPD * hsPDA + GA + sex + LOS + PH + (1 | ID) Data: df_mod AIC BIC logLik -2*log(L) df.resid -632.7 -596.6 327.4 -654.7 186 Random effects: Conditional model: Groups Name Variance Std.Dev. ID (Intercept) 0.05439 0.2332 Number of obs: 197, groups: ID, 84 Dispersion estimate for Gamma family (sigma^2): 0.0557 Conditional model: Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) (Intercept) -2.869158 0.562200 -5.103 3.34e-07 *** Time 0.044518 0.003321 13.405 < 2e-16 *** BPD1 -0.191272 0.090596 -2.111 0.0348 * hsPDA -0.013552 0.015591 -0.869 0.3847 GA 0.031739 0.019196 1.653 0.0982 . sex2 0.078263 0.071309 1.098 0.2724 LOS1 0.036162 0.072259 0.500 0.6168 PH1 -0.208732 0.081884 -2.549 0.0108 * BPD1:hsPDA 0.015162 0.017334 0.875 0.3817 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 ``` ::: ::: ## Discussione Per gli outcome secondari (RR, VT/kg, tPTEF) sono stati stimati GLMM Gamma con link log e intercetta random per soggetto. L’età corretta (mesi) è risultata associata a una marcata riduzione di RR (≈ −4.4% per mese, p \< 0.001) e a un incremento di VT/kg (≈ +1.5% per mese, p \< 0.001) e tPTEF (≈ +4.6% per mese, p \< 0.001). Non è emersa evidenza di un’associazione di hsPDA né di un’interazione hsPDA×BPD su questi outcome. Per tPTEF, tuttavia, BPD e ipertensione polmonare risultano associate a valori inferiori dell’indice (≈ −17% e ≈ −19%, rispettivamente), a parità di covariate. ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between .mt-4} ← Torna indietro Pagina successiva → :::
